price: 16. nummah Ni dudda tascasse astootik tanim: addunyâ Qaraanal cutuukâ mafdagoogi hayneeh cutuukut kaa bilqisne kaa fan waktaah cubbusaah elle kaskassoowa marah.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ جَعَلۡنَا فِي ٱلسَّمَآءِ بُرُوجٗا وَزَيَّنَّٰهَا لِلنَّٰظِرِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: walaqad jaʿalnā fī al-samāi burūjan wazayyannāhā lilnnāẓirīna
